1692.text: CODE OF CONDUCT FOR InvIT AND PARTIES TO THE InvIT
nounChunks: InvIT AND PARTIES TO THE InvIT
CODE OF CONDUCT FOR InvIT AND PARTIES TO THE InvIT

1693.text: 1.InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall conduct all affairs of the InvIT in the interest of all the unit-holders of the InvIT.
nounChunks: all the unit-holders of the InvIT
the interest of all the unit-holders of the InvIT

1694.text: 2.InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall make adequate, accurate, explicit and timely disclosure of relevant material information to all unit holders, exchanges and the Board in accordance with these regulations and as may be specified by the stock exchanges from time to time.
nounChunks: adequate, accurate, explicit and timely disclosure of relevant material information to all unit holders, exchanges and the Board in accordance with these regulations
all unit holders, exchanges and the Board
adequate, accurate, explicit and timely disclosure

1695.text: 3.InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall try to avoid conflicts of interest, as far as possible, in managing the affairs of the InvIT and keep the interest of all unit holders paramount in all matters. In case such events cannot be avoided, it shall be ensured that appropriate disclosures are made to the unit-holders and they are fairly treated.
nounChunks: the interest of all unit holders paramount

1696.text: 4.The InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall ensure that fees charged by them with respect to activity of InvIT shall be fair and reasonable.
nounChunks: fees charged by them with respect to activity of InvIT
4.The InvIT and parties to the InvIT

1697.text: 5.Investment manager shall carry out the business of the InvIT and invest in accordance with the investment objectives stated in the offer document 318[or placement memorandum,] and take investment decisions solely in the interest of unit holders.
nounChunks: accordance with the investment objectives stated in the offer
the investment objectives stated in the offer

1698.text: 6.InvIT, parties to the InvIT and any third party appointed by the investment manager shall not use any unethical means to sell, market or induce any person to buy units of the InvIT and where a third party appointed by the investment manager fails to comply with this condition, the investment manager shall be held liable for the same.
nounChunks: parties to the InvIT and any third party appointed by the investment manager
any third party appointed by the investment manager
a third party appointed by the investment manager

1699.text: 7.InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall maintain high standards of integrity and

1703.text: 8.InvIT and parties to the InvIT shall render at all times high standards of service, exercise due diligence, ensure proper care and exercise independent professional judgment.
